title: Peloton Bikes, Treadmills Are About to Cost You More
sub_head: Fitness company said it is adding hundreds of dollars in setup and delivery charges to list prices for some of its exercise equipment
body:
The prices people pay for some Peloton Interactive Inc . products are about to increase.
The at-home fitness company, hurt by slowing demand, is set to start charging customers hundreds of dollars in delivery and setup fees for its basic stationary bike and treadmill products, according to a banner notice on its website.
